name: technician

effect.x_y: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.

short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.x_y: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
